name: Twistingo: Bird Paradise Collector's Edition
description:
MixoGames presents Guardian of Lands: Bird Paradise Collector’s Edition, a charming tropical adventure of fun in the sun!

Play a variety of puzzles and games, including clever blends of hidden objects, bingo, and marble-popping. Each step gets you closer to recovering the missing artifacts and restoring the island to its natural beauty. Are you up to the challenge? Then get ready for the captivating, genre-blending puzzles in Twistingo!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

  • 15 Bonus story mode levels to continue your adventure!
  • 9 extra levels for free play mode!
  • 9 extra randomly generated levels in infinite mode!
  • 3 mini-game modes to earn extra coins!
  • Music player and more!
